dimensions: Warp: 14 cm (5 1/2 in.). Weft: 75 cm (29 1/2 in.) Left selvedge present.
title: Chef de piece
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Elinor Merrell where it was No. 19A on her list of chefs de piece.
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description: In red on white portions of two scenes: a naked sleeper being uncovered and a god holding a lyre and riding a dolphin.
name: Chef de piece
